quiz.question: What is polymorphism?
quiz.option1: Polymorphism is a technique to define different objects of same type
quiz.option2: Polymorphism is the ability of an object to take on many forms
quiz.option3: Polymorphism is a technique to define different methods of same type
quiz.answer: Polymorphism is the ability of an object to take on many forms

quiz.question: Which method must be implemented by all threads?
What kind of variables a class can consist of?
What is JRE?
quiz.option1: JRE is a Java based GUI application
quiz.option2: JRE is an application development framework
quiz.option3: JRE is an implementation of the Java Virtual Machine which executes Java programs
quiz.answer: JRE is an implementation of the Java Virtual Machine which executes Java programs
